name: Tinheung & Sayuri
storyline: Set in a corner of Shenzhen, China. Tong Tinheung, who has just graduated, came to a company she was not interested in and engaged in a job she was not interested in. When she decided to resign, she had a wonderful connection with the Japanese leader of the supplier company, Matsuzaki Sayuri, and had a feeling of curiosity and longing for it. In order to meet Sayuri, Tinheung decided to postpone her resignation plan and has been fiercely and directly pouring out her love to Sayuri...
summary: Tinheung & Sayuri is a game of visual novel. This is a short Yuri story across age, nationality and gender.
